text: Charles Kimbrough (May 23, 1936 - January 11, 2023) was an American actor. He was known for having played the straight-faced anchorman Jim Dial on Murphy Brown. Kimbrough died in Culver City, California, on January 11, 2023, at the age of 86.Charles Kimbrough, Actor Best Known for ‘Murphy Brown,’ Dies at 86 ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Actors from Saint Paul, Minnesota Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors
title: Charles Kimbrough
